entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 this morning then steady. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 this morning then steady. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening then changing to periods of rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 late this evening then southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 5 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Flurries late in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 late in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 5 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023
